pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, August 30, 2017:

Moncton, New Brunswick

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Premier of New Brunswick, Brian Gallant, will visit the child care and early learning centre Wee College. An announcement and media availability will follow.

Wee College
Bessborough Campus
110 Athlone Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit
  • Open coverage for media availability and announcement
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.

Miramichi, New Brunswick

3:40 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Public Services and Procurement, Carla Qualtrough, will visit employees of the Public Service Pay Centre.

Closed to media.

Note: All times local
